name: pnp-list-formatting-menu-link-button
title: Menu Link button
shortDescription: This sample allows for the creation of quick links through the use of buttons with additional features. These features include the ability to configure the button using size and color.
longDescription: This sample allows for the creation of quick links through the use of buttons with additional features. These features include the ability to configure the button using size and color. It does not include features like audience targeting, ability to change position of the icon and few others.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
